recipesJson.name: Strawberry Shortcake Bar
recipesJson.author: NotCharlesManson
recipesJson.description: Strawberry and vanilla ice cream, coated with shortcake crumbles.

reviews.text: love this recipe!

I love this recipe!! At the time I made it, I only had TPA sweet strawberry. Overnight steep, it was tasty but after 3 days the strawberry popped out! Very authentic to the profile and smells delicious! Iâ€™m almost out of the 75 ml I made 7 days ago. Going to make more today!
My favorite Strawberry recipe by FAR! You simply must try this. Everything about it is so well balanced and accurate to the profile.
Delicious!!

This is very close in taste to its profile. Super accurate. I enjoy this but I have issues with a lot of cake concentrates. Initially I did not like what this steeped into after about a week. I omitted the cake and the notes that made it muddy for me went away. I subbed in 3% DFS Angel Food Cake and it was Delicious!
If you have a notcharlesmanson recipe with all 5 stars comments and IDIO-T comment as "best thing ever". What are you waiting to mix?.

One of my favorite recipes of all time. Beautiful take on this profile and you deliver it in a perfect way. Excellent work!
PS: Please comeback Manson
Might right tasty
Pretty nice
very good.  been lovin this one
This recipe is TIP TOP!Thank you.

It sounds great on paper but unfortunately all i can taste is the green stem of a strawberry. No cake, no strawberry. I think I might be flavor deaf to TPA's strawberries.  I'd be curious to try this again but with a different combination of strawberries.

First time I mixed this I wasn't a fan initially, got into it too quick and it was super buttery.  With a good week or two of steeping though it comes together perfectly.  Super rich and thick with a nice level of strawberry to keep it balanced.  Great dessert vape.
Very good
Beyond Excellent, A+
Hits the profile.  Very delicious.
Awesome recipe, pefect flavor balance and spot on.

Is a great and well balanced recipe. 
It's flavorful and hits its profile well.
This is delicious. This is the first strawberry vape I've truly enjoyed. Thank you.
This recipe is mutha-fucking perfection. This juice comes straight from God's nipples.
What's the best steep time for this?
i've never had a shortcake bar but it's just an amazing vape.something different than the regular strawberry milk
Nice recipe now I see were pancake man came from! No steep yet so strawberry hasn't quite made it to the front yet but tastes good shake and Vape so Ime definitely throwing a 120ml together

This is a great recipe based on the reference. It really gives the impression of an actual strawberry shortcake bar, the cake base is accomplished very well and it very satisfying. The strawberry is also done very well to give off a bright strawberry flavor.
Pretty much the best thing ever
